lines.text: We've been blind. We were proud dearest when we took the cross in our pride, we fought to conquer Jerusalem. We tried to ride through blood to the Holy Place of God. And now... now we suffer.
What if we call him Allah or God? Shall men fight because they travel different roads to him? There is only one God.

[Resisting Richard pulling her into her father's room]
Let go of my wrist! You're hurting it.

[after being told she must vacate her cabin on the ship for another royal lady]
I am Alice of France, betrothed to King Richard. Who are you?
